item.title: CVE-2024-30433|2024-03-29T17:29:27.697Z -- MultiVendorX -- WC Marketplace
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in MultiVendorX WC Marketplace allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WC Marketplace: from n/a through 4.1.3.
